note.p: Death: His house in Essex Street, Strand, London (25 May 1802)
Education: Marischal College, Aberdeen University, MA (1753); Edinburgh University medical school, MD (1758)
Career: Taught Chemistry in London; Physician, St Thomas' Hospital, London (1770-1802)
References: William P D Wightman, 'Aberdeen University and the Royal Society' in NR 1954-55 vol 11 pp 145-158
A D Atkinson, 'Dr Johnson and the Royal Society' in NR 1953 vol 10 pp 131-138
N G Coley, 'George Pearson MD, FRS (1751-1828): 'The greatest chemist in England'? in NR 2003 vol 57 pp
